$comment: NOTE: GitHub MCP server tools (repo operations, issues, PRs) are built-in to Copilot and do not need configuration here. GitHub MCP uses OAuth through Copilot's built-in authentication.

claude.description: Anthropic's Claude MCP server for enhanced AI capabilities and integrations.

context7.description: Up-to-date Python security documentation for Bandit, Ruff, mypy, pytest, and compliance frameworks (OWASP, CWE, PCI-DSS, HIPAA). Provides accurate, version-specific documentation with no hallucinations.

openai-websearch.description: Web search for Python security patterns, CWE/OWASP standards, compliance frameworks, and emerging security threats. Use for current threat intelligence and best practices.

fetch.description: Fetch web content for security research, vulnerability databases (CVE, NVD), and compliance documentation. Useful for researching security advisories and standards.

playwright.description: Browser automation for web security testing and validation. Use for testing web application security patterns and interactive security demonstrations.
